TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Toweng_si, title = Toweng_si, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Toweng_si} }

S.FORM: Toweng si mki sku Takaw Si. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 969.43 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 871.9 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 86.77 km²), 4,172 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 1,320 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 3,872 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 93%. kwara sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Bunun, Hla'aluwa ku smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebu Toweng si ays psgayun 8 ru 14 alang. 14 alang hani ga, Ciusinlun , Husida , Tamahu , Sʉhlʉnganʉ/Sulungan , Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising , Su'aci , Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani , Tanguhla/Dinkam , Mizuhu , Ua-asik , Lavulan , Dakus , Masuhuaz , Dai-ni .

Toweng si mki sko Takaw Si. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 969.43 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 871.9 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 86.77 km²), 4,172 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 1,320 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 3,872 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 93%. kwara sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Bonon, Hla'alowa ko smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. ays ptyaw sebo Toweng si ays psgayon 8 ro 14 alang. 14 alang hani ga, Ciosinlon , Hosida , Tamaho , Sʉhlʉnganʉ/Solongan , Rʉhlʉcʉ/Haising , So'aci , Kalʉvʉnga/Ngani , Tangohla/Dinkam , Mizoho , Ua-asik , Lavolan , Dakos , Masohoaz , Dai-ni .
